page.title: 20Our 1985 DOMESDAY survey
page.content: This is a{summary}of the block we have surveyed for the Domesday Project. The SW part bordering Exmouth town centre is mostly small shops; several streets of Victorian terraced houses some of which are known as "The Colony";and the main Exeter Road into town. The town has expanded steadily since the last war and the rest of our block is mixed housing ranging from large, older houses along Exeter and Hulham Roads to the growing estates in the Brixington area.Our block includes some farmland to the N and E but this is gradually being bought for and there is a controversial plan to build a larger industrial estate to the N and to complete the ring-road (Dinan Way). Our thanks go to the many parents of children at both schools and students at Rolle College who helped us to complete our Survey.
